name: Dovu Energy Trap
flavorText: "Those unaware of the true nature of the world are unable to keep their spirits from being used against them." —Dovu, the Tribe of the Clouded Valley
flavorTextHtml: "Those unaware of the true nature of the world are unable to keep their spirits from being used against them." —Dovu, the Tribe of the Clouded Valley

primary.textHtml: Reduces cooldown of all skills by [5.0 - 8.0]%.
primary.text: Reduces cooldown of all skills by [5.0 - 8.0]%.

secondary.textHtml: Increases duration of Stun effects by 22%. (Emanates) [20 - 25]%
